forum.content: Firstable, start to use English as much as you can, like something you read, some TV series , and most importantly, stop thinking English with Chinese...a lot people do...like when they talking to a foreigner , usually  they translated in the head with Chinese first and try to understand the meaning in Chinese..this is wrong way.. so try to create an English environment from now on..and using English to English dictionary and do not afraid to speak with foreigners, make mistakes?so what? that's the way to learn! Don't  be afraid you guys. just do it! good luck to everyone! 🤗🤗❤
